channel.title: Wasteland items.
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Wasteland items."

item.title: Re: Wasteland items.
item.content:encoded: I started Outskirts in season 1, so please help me if you could send something you don't need that helps me. I'm ichimaruu.

item.title: Re: Wasteland items.
item.content:encoded: No, wastelands items of the same type don't stack and yes, the one you use is the best version of it you have. This was explained in the game's FAQ section.

item.title: Wasteland items.
item.content:encoded:
I have a question:
do wasteland items of the same type stack?

I have Makeshift Scythe (+1 range) and a Silver Scythe (+1 range, +2 levels), base range 20/19/19 and Bones (+1 range, +3 levels) in my team. Yet on wasteland missions I find my range only to be 22/21/21 which is 1 less than expected. Can anyone confirm if whether this is true or not? It would save me some permanent item spotsâ€¦

If they don't stack, I guess the best one will be 'used' ?
